#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int ans(int num1, int num2)
{
    int rem1, rem2, carry=0, ctr=0;
    while(num1 && num2)
    {
        rem1=num1%10;
        rem2=num2%10;
        if((carry+rem1+rem2)>=10)
        {
            carry=1;
            ctr++;
        }
        else
            carry=0;
        num1/=10;
        num2/=10;
    }
    return ctr;
}
int main()
{
    int a, b;
    while(true)
    {
        scanf("%d %d", &a, &b);
        if(a==0 && b==0)
            break;
        if(ans(a, b)==0)
            cout<<"No carry operation."<<endl;
        else if(ans(a, b)==1)
            cout<<"1 carry operation."<<endl;
        else
            cout<<ans(a, b)<<" carry operations."<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
